purpose: The email announces the 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025), scheduled for October 14-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It aims to gather researchers, academics, and industry experts to discuss the metaverse's technologies, applications, and implications. The conference will feature keynote speeches, panel discussions, and workshops, providing opportunities for networking and collaboration. Additionally, it outlines important dates for paper submissions and publication details.
evidence_sentences: The 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA 2025)

The International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications (iMETA) is to bring together leading researchers, academics, and industry experts to explore the various aspects of the distributive metaverse, including its technologies, applications, and implications for various industries.

Throughout the conference, there will be ample opportunities for attendees to network, share their knowledge, and collaborate on future initiatives that will drive the development of the metaverse forward.
All accepted papers in iMETA 2025 and the workshops co-located with it will be submitted to IEEEXplore, dblp and Scopus for inclusion.
